name: Mareep

evolution.description: Mareep can evolve into Flaaffy at level 5 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 5 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Wool Pokémon. Rubbing its fleece generates electricity. You’ll want to pet it because it’s cute, but if you use your bare hand, you’ll get a painful shock.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of electric damage equal to this Pokemon's proficiency bonus.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.description: This Pokémon boosts its attack and damage rolls by 2 if an ally also has a Plus or Minus ability
